Hello all,

I have a question that not is about JUnit, but as all people here are
testers, you can to help me!!

I would like to know about test tools for graphic interface, as

Rrational tools, Mercury..

I need a test tool that I can to use for Java, C, VB graphic interface.

Somebody here use a test tool for to test graphic interface? What? Is very
expensive?

Somebody can to help me?

Thank you,

Marcio Freitas
